entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
